(815x1+0)/1 mod 1024 = 815. (815x3+1)/2 mod 512 = 199. (815x9+5)/4 mod 256 = 43. (815x27+19)/8 mod 128 = 65. (815x81+65)/16 mod 64 = 34. (815x81+65)/32 mod 32 = 17. (815x243+227)/64 mod 16 = 10. (815x243+227)/128 mod 8 = 5. (815x729+809)/256 mod 4 = 0. (815x729+809)/512 mod 2 = 0. (815x729+809)/1024 mod 1 = 0.
